thread.title: Road to ruin? A China debt binge divides Uganda

title: Road to ruin? A China debt binge divides Uganda
text:
Road to ruin? A China debt binge divides Uganda 9:52pm IST - 01:34 
Loans from China helped Uganda build a speedy new road to its main airport. But critics say the country is now too deep in debt to Beijing. Lucy Fielder reports. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Loans from China helped Uganda build a speedy new road to its main airport. But critics say the country is now too deep in debt to Beijing. Lucy Fielder reports. Press CTRL+C (Windows), CMD+C (Mac), or long-press the URL below on your mobile device to copy the code https://reut.rs/2nsM2bG
